alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 9:03PM CDT until March 28 at 12:27PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Sullivan. Meramec River near Steelville. Big River at Byrnesville. Bourbeuse River at Union. Meramec River near Eureka. Meramec River at Pacific. Meramec River at Valley Park. Meramec River at Fenton. Meramec River near Arnold. Black River near Annapolis. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Kaskaskia River at Vandalia. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING TO EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Big River at Byrnesville. * WHEN...From Friday evening to early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 22.4 feet, At this level, Twin Rivers Bridge Road must be closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 4.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to a crest of 22.5 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Big River Byrnesville 16.0 4.1 18.2 22.5 18.0 10.6 8.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Rainfall heavier than forecast could cause river levels to rise even higher than predicted. The National Weather Service will monitor this developing situation and issue follow up statements as conditions change. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
